name: X-Men Families Online Quiz | Marvel Comics | 5 Questions

questions.text: Carter (father, deceased), Katherine (alias Barbara London, mother), Bella (grandmother), Lois London (stepsister), are related to whom?
questions.explanation:
Dazzler.

	Dazzler was born in Gardendale, Long Island, New York!

questions.text: Cartier (father), Mother (name unrevealed, deceased), Monet (sister), unidentified twin siblings, are related to whom?

Mr. Callasantos (father, first,name unrevealed, deceased), Marcella Callasantos,(mother, deceased), Lucia Callasantos (Thornn, sister), Matteo Callasantos (brother, deceased), Carolina Callasantos (sister, deceased), are related to whom?
questions.explanation:
Feral.

	Feral's real name is Maria Callasantos!

questions.text: Coy Leong (brother), Coy Nga (sister), Tran Coy Manh (brother, deceased), General Nguyen Ngoc Coy (uncle, deceased), are related to whom?
questions.explanation:
Karma.

	Karma's real name is, Xi'an (pronounced 'Shan') Coy Manh.
